string-array.name: edge_double_click_task
string-array.item: The task should be executed when the edge get double touched.

string-array.name: edge_long_click_task
string-array.item: The task should be executed when the edge get long clicked

string-array.name: edge_seek_task
string-array.item: The task should be executed when the edge get touched.

string-array.name: edge_rotate
string-array.item: Is it allowed to rotate edges when the screen rotates.

string-array.name: edge_xposition
string-array.item: The secondary position of this edge.

string-array.name: edge_vibration
string-array.item: The vibration duration when the edge get touched.

string-array.name: edge_maximum
string-array.item: Maximum value allowed to be set.

string-array.name: edge_minimum
string-array.item: Minimum value allowed to be set.

string-array.name: edge_stream
string-array.item: For audio task. To define what stream to be targeted.

string-array.name: edge_wallpapers
string-array.item: For change wallpaper task. The directory where the wallpapers get stored at.

string-array.name: edge_long_click_timeout
string-array.item: The time to preform a long click task.

string-array.name: edge_spam_timeout
string-array.item: The time to reset spam counting

string-array.name: edge_spams
string-array.item: The spams required to preform a spam task

string-array.name: app_ui_theme
string-array.item: The overall theme of this application
